name: recordAdd
description: Add the specified DNS Records to the specified Domain

X-Shopper-Id.description: Shopper ID which owns the domain. NOTE: This is only required if you are a Reseller managing a domain purchased outside the scope of your reseller account. For instance, if you're a Reseller, but purchased a Domain via http://www.godaddy.com

domain.description: Domain whose DNS Records are to be augmented

body.description: DNS Records to add to whatever currently exists
